episodes.title: Scientology
episodes.description:
Today’s episode is about Scientology!
Trigger warnings: Sexual Assault, Cult discussion
A special thank you to Ricky Rodriguez at BombHouse Recording for the original music for this episode. Check out his store and studio at this link! -> https://bombhouserecording.com/
Don’t forget to follow us on instagram and tik tok @southernunhospitalitypod or reach out to us by email with any case suggestions at southernunhospitalitypod@gmail.com.
